meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be modified.
meanings.sent1: Her modifiabilities allowed her to adapt to new situations easily.
meanings.sent2: The modifiabilities of the software made it customizable for different users.
meanings.sent3: The robot's modifiabilities were put to the test when it had to learn to dance.
meanings.sent4: His artistic modifiabilities transformed a simple sketch into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The modifiabilities of the building design ensured it could withstand various weather conditions.

meanings.definition: The ability to be changed or altered.
meanings.sent1: The modifiabilities of the recipe allowed for different variations of the dish.
meanings.sent2: The modifiabilities of the contract made it easy to update when needed.
meanings.sent3: The modifiabilities of the magic potion surprised even the experienced wizard.
meanings.sent4: Her mind's modifiabilities were like a canvas waiting for new ideas to paint.
meanings.sent5: The modifiabilities of the plant's DNA made it resistant to pests and diseases.
